Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. Love is the over-arching theme of this film: erotic love, social love, shared moments, the love of lovers and friend, and above all the love of family. It is a story of a very Japanese world held in juxtaposition against the world of White Love.
The film posits love as an abstraction.
